text: akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahanige serive. ‘‘Allahanige anjiri. Nivu dhikkarigaladare, akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahanige serive (embudannu mareyabedi)’’ endu i hinde grantha nidalagiddavarige navu upadesisiddevu mattu nimagu upadesisuttiddeve. Allahanantu ella agatyagalinda muktanu ella prasansegalige ar'hanu agiruvanu
